tool_description: Verifies regulatory compliance requirements for network infrastructure deployment including zoning laws, building codes, environmental regulations, and permit requirements.

site_type.description: Type of installation: tower, rooftop, small_cell, das

jurisdiction.description: Regulatory jurisdiction: federal, state, county, municipal

environmental_impact_score.description: Environmental impact assessment score from Environmental Impact Assessor

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid site type: Use tower, rooftop, small_cell, or das.
Invalid structure height: Height must be a positive number.
Invalid jurisdiction: Use federal, state, county, or municipal.
Regulatory data unavailable: Compliance requirements not available for this jurisdiction.
Height restriction violation: Proposed height exceeds local zoning limits.
usage: Provide site coordinates, structure specifications, and jurisdiction level. Include environmental impact score if available. Returns comprehensive compliance assessment and permit requirements.

zoning_compliant.description: Whether the site complies with local zoning laws

permits_required.description: List of required permits and approvals

height_restrictions.description: Maximum allowed structure height in meters

estimated_approval_days.description: Estimated days for regulatory approval process
